abstract: Bank of America took more than a few analysts and investors by surprise on Friday by disclosing that the pending financial regulatory overhaul may cost the firm $10 billion or more.
snippet: Bank of America took more than a few analysts and investors by surprise on Friday by disclosing that the pending financial regulatory overhaul may cost the firm $10 billion or more.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America took more than a few analysts and investors by surprise on its earnings call Friday by disclosing that the pending financial regulatory overhaul may cost the firm $10 billion or more.

headline.main: New Card Rules May Cost BofA Billions in Revenue
